% This is a sample map used for testing
% All lines beginning with % are ignored and can be used for comments
% All whitespace and empty lines is also ignored.
% Maps are expected to be rectangular and you may get weird results if they aren't
%Symbols meaning:
% W - Wall
% 0 - Empty tile
% P - Player spawn point
% N - Npc spawn point
% x - Point
% u - Power up
% f - Fruit

%DO NOT EDIT!!

W W W W W W W
W x 0 P 0 x W
W x W W W x W
W x f N u x W
W x W W W x W
W x 0 P 0 x W
W W W W W W W
